name: Bright Frontier Financial
tag_list: cra, cra-lending, mortgages, education, finance, loans, career, transition, career-switch, student-loans, financing, investment-platform
overview:
Bright Frontier Financial has set out to fix one of the largest and most important problems facing 21st Century America: making access to college education affordable and within reach to all. Working with a network of top-tier banks and patient private capital, we have set out on a mission of becoming the most equitable student loan company in the world.

In achieving this mission, we have been first to market in many areas, including being the first student loan company focused solely on rewarding proven graduates (via a refinancing-only focus), the first to build a network of banks that allows it to avoid reliance on capital markets, and the first private lender to offer an income-based repayment feature in some our loans.
